name: TheMostImportantDecision
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: most important decision
des: Going vegan is quite simply the most important decision anyone can make. The impact eating meat, eggs, and dairy has on the environment, human health, and billions of animals is unparalleled. This skill helps you decide if going vegan is the right choice for you. Simply say "Alexa, enable the most important decision," then say "Alexa open most important decision," to get started.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
